WeNMR  is both a three years project funded under the European Commission's 7th Framework Programme (e-Infrastructure RI-261571) and a Virtual Research Community supported by EGI, the largest one within the life science area. WeNMR aims at bringing together complementary research teams in the structural biology and life science area into a virtual research community at a worldwide level and provide them with a platform integrating and streamlining the computational approaches necessary for NMR and SAXS data analysis and structural modelling. Keywords: Nuclear Magnetic Resonance spectroscopy (NMR), Small angle X-ray Scattering (SAXS), structural biology, Life Sciences, proteins, DNA, complexes, web portals, e-Infrastructure

The connection between Microsoft Dyanmics CRM and SURFconext offers student and employees of educational institutes the possibility to log on to applications, build by CRM Resultants, using the SURFconext log on. De connection compares data in SURFconext with data in Microsoft Dynamics CRM: if the student or employee exists in both applications and have the right to log on, they will have access to the application.
description:nl: De koppeling van Microsoft Dynamics CRM met SURFconext biedt studenten en medewerkers van onderwijsinstellingen de mogelijkheid om in te loggen in diverse applicaties, gebouwd door CRM Resultants, door middel van Single Sign On. De koppeling kijkt naar de aanwezigheid van studentrecords in zowel SURFconext als in CRM en vergelijkt deze data: indien ze in beide applicaties bestaan en recht hebben om in te loggen, wordt toegang tot de applicatie van CRM Resultants verschaft.

Xerte Online Toolkit (XOT) is an open source authoring tool that allows non-technical users to develop interactive and interesting online learning materials, quickly and easy. Via template wizards they can add images, (youtube) videos, links, spoken and / or written text, slide shows, etc.,  to a learning module. This can be alternated with interactive exercises such as hot spots, drag & drop exercises, fill in the gap pages, quizzes and more. Xerte is fully html5 and can be used on all sort of divices. It's available in several languages including Dutch, English, Norwegian, etc.
description:nl: Xerte Online Toolkit (XOT) is een open source auteurstool die het niet-technische gebruikers mogelijk maakt om snel en eenvoudig rijke, interactieve en interessante online leermiddelen te ontwikkelen. Via invulschermen kunnen afbeeldingen, (youtube) video's, links, gesproken en/of geschreven tekst, slide shows, enz. toegevoegd worden aan een module. Dit kan worden afgewisseld met interactieve oefeningen zoals o.a. hotspot, drag & drop, fill in the gap, quizzen, etc. Xerte is volledig html5 en dus te gebruiken op allerlei mobile devices. Het is beschikbaar in verschillende talen o.a. Nederlands, Engels, Noors, etc.

RemindoTest (RemindoToets) is an online multilingual exam and test platform for developing items, item banks and tests, in a secure environment. The entire process involving developing, analyzing, improving and managing test items and delivering them securely to students takes place online on an innovative and user friendly platform. RemindoTest supports a variety of question types, supports audio and video, works with secure browsers, both within secure environments for high stakes testing as well as BOYD (Bring Your Own Device) for formative tests where RemindoTest immediately provides feedback to the students.

description:en: The Dynasec easy2comply GRC (Governance, Risk & Compliance) platform has been designed to enable integration and convergence of all GRC initiatives and proven 'in control'. Business, IT and Internal Audit will be using a risk-control framework, consisting of processes related to rules and regulations, (IT) assets, financial accounts, objectives, risks and controls. The application supports the identification and assessment of tactical, strategic and operational risks, the implementation of mitigation controls and assessing their effectiveness. All necessary workflows, including for any deficiencies, improvement actions and to manage simple recommendations already exist. The PDCA cycle is fully supported. The application builds an audit / log file of all actions. This enables analysis, self-service reports and dashboards across all data over time. The Hogescholen recommended risk management methodology from design to dashboarding is available as a template. ISMS has been setup according the SURF-standard, IT standards, classifications, CIA ratings and additional measures.
description:nl: Het Dynasec easy2comply GRC (Governance, Risk & Compliance) platform is ontworpen om integratie en convergentie van alle GRC initiatieven mogelijk te maken en aantoonbaar In Control te zijn. Business, IT en Internal Audit gebruiken een risico-controle raamwerk, bestaande uit processen gekoppeld aan regel- en wetgeving, (IT) assets, financile accounts, doelstellingen, risicos en beheersmaatregelen (Controls). De applicatie ondersteunt het inventariseren en inschatten van tactische, strategische en operationele risicos, het implementeren van mitigerende maatregelen en het toetsen van de effectiviteit hiervan. Alle benodigde workflows, ook om eventuele tekortkomingen, verbeterakties en aanbevelingen eenvoudig te kunnen beheren, zijn aanwezig. De PDCA-cyclus wordt volledig ondersteund. De applicatie bouwt een audit / log file op met alle akties. Hierdoor zijn analyses, Self-Service rapportages en dashboards over alle data in de tijd mogelijk. De Hogescholen geadviseerde risicomanagement methodiek van opzet tot dashboarding is als template aanwezig. ISMS is volledig conform de SURF-standaard opgezet, IT normen, BIV classificaties en aanvullende maatregelen.

Er wordt hierbij expliciet aandacht besteed aan de verschillende soorten architectuurkennis en hun onderlinge samenhang.
